entries.question: Why did He come to this world?
entries.authorNote: It is when Christ is received as a personal Saviour that salvation comes to the soul:' (EG White, The Desire of Ages, p. 556.)

entries.question: Does Christ still live and exercise His divine power, after having been crucified?
entries.authorNote: The divinity of Christ is the believer's assurance of eternal life:Â· (EG White, The Desire of Ages, p.530.)
